description.value: Your fury carries your weapon through multiple foes. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Cleave], if your Strike also reduces its target to 0 HP, you can continue to make melee Strikes until you make a Strike that doesn't reduce a creature to 0 HP, or until there are no creatures adjacent to the most recent creature you attacked while Cleaving, whichever comes first.
